name: godbot
description: The 'GodBot' bot code, created for the unofficial Discord server of web and mobile game Godville.
updateMsg1: 5.29.2 GodBot can now solve locations from the crossword as well!
updateMsg2: 5.29 Added >pet, the first command that generates a gif!
updateMsg3: 5.28 >solvehtml now sends the crossword solution as an image.
